```{r}
interestUK <- !str_detect(colnames(data), "^EX+\\DUK") & str_detect(colnames(data), "\\DUK") & !str_detect(colnames(data), "^rw|^var")
nd_pars<-expand.grid(ar=0:2,diff=0:1,ma=0:2)
nd_aic<-rep(0,nrow(nd_pars))
for(i in seq(along=nd_aic)) nd_aic[i]<-AIC(arimax(data[, "EX_UKUS"],unlist(nd_pars[i,1:3]), xreg = data[, interestUK]), method = 'Ml')
nd_pars[which.min(nd_aic),]
```
